data: Once you confirm account deletion, this action cannot be undone.
Check {0} to continue the account deletion process.
You have initiated deletion of your account. Once you have verified deletion by email, then your account will be scheduled to be deleted.
Something went wrong when going through the authorization process to confirm account deletion.
Unable to proceed as the email associated with your account is invalid.
By tapping Continue, you’ll need to provide your activation lock to continue the account deletion process. This action cannot be undone.
Please authenticate to continue with deletion.
Your account is scheduled to be deleted.
Please wait up to 24 hours for your account to be deleted.
Once your Pokémon GO account is deleted, it will no be longer accessible by you or anyone else. This action cannot be undone.
How to revoke access to my Apple ID?
